title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.41 - Stands for race officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.41 - Stands for race officials

State Regulations

Stands for judges, timers and stewards shall be
maintained in positions commanding an uninterrupted view of the entire racing
strip and shall be subject to approval by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
